amendment.description: To return the bill to the President's proposal.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3615 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 26. Record Vote Number: 96.
Amendment SA 3615 proposed by Senator Thomas. (consideration: CR S3551-3552) To return the bill to the President's proposal.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3615 proposed by Senator Thomas.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3615 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 72 - 26. Record Vote Number: 96.
